title: 11/16 NA, OCE, and PBE Server Issues
body:
Hey! 


> **UPDATES**: 
> 1:10pm PT: NA services are coming back up, with the others to follow.
> 11:59pm PT: PBE and OCE are also impacted.


There are currently server issues on NA preventing players from logging in, starting a game, opening the store, etc.  

We will have updates posted on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na), and I'll also share info I find in this thread.  

Hang tight friends, our teams are on the case!

replies.body:
Alright! About how long will it take? Also, I love the response time >u<. Riot Rules!
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

I was in a game when this problem started and it hasn't shown up on my match history.  Do you know if the game results from the past ~1 hour have been effected?

edit/update:  The game is now in my match history and shows as a victory, but the win didn't register as the second win on my promo series and the match history doesn't show a grade or any XP as being earned.
The match in question is the most recent victory shown here: https://imgur.com/a/ucLGN
